name: Days of Memories: Boku to Kanojo no Atsui Natsu
storyline: The story follows the adventures of the male lead (player character) and the the female cast. During the last summer of high school, the player has a premonition that something will happen between himself and the girls he came to know and became friends with.
summary: Female warriors and other girls from SNK games make their appearances in this dating simulation game.
